programs.title: Azmat-E-Dal
programs.description: A multi-year ecological restoration mission to restore Dal Lake's water quality, reduce pollution, and rebuild tourism-linked livelihoods for communities that depend on the lake.

programs.title: Khab-E-Tabir
programs.description: Flagship programme for underprivileged women victims of cross border terrorism with 161-INF BDE Boniyar Baramula

programs.title: Seekho Aur Kamao
programs.description: Vocational training program offering market-relevant courses in hospitality, IT, tailoring, and health support services with strong placement support and employer linkages.

programs.title: Nai Roshini
programs.description: Women's empowerment program expanding women's economic participation through tailored training, micro-enterprise grants, and community safety-net systems.

programs.title: SIPDA
programs.description: Social Inclusion & Placement Driven Action ensures marginalized groups gain access to market-linked skills and job placement services with barrier reduction support.

programs.title: PMKVY Initiatives
programs.description: Government-aligned skill development courses providing recognized certifications that improve employability through NSDC/PMKVY standards and placement support.
